data.comment: The match has started.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In the minute 1, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Tokyo.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Kobe drives forward and Keijiro Ogawa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Yusuke Araki has awarded Kobe a corner.
In the minute 6, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Yusuke Araki signals a Kobe throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Kensuke Nagai (Tokyo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.
Tokyo are pushing forward but Adailton's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Kobe at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Kobe takes a corner from the left.
Kobe's Gotoku Sakai misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 16, Tokyo have a goal kick.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a Kobe throw-in in Tokyo's half.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Tokyo.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
In the minute 22, Yusuke Araki awards Kobe a goal kick.
Throw-in Tokyo.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
In the minute 25, Tokyo to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Joan Oumari (Tokyo) gets in a strike â€“ but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 28, Tokyo takes a corner from the left.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Kobe have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Kobe are coming forward and Yuta Goke gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kobe are whistled for offside.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Tokyo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Yusuke Araki has awarded Kobe a corner.
In the minute 45, Yusuke Araki has awarded Kobe a corner.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Kobe at Ajinomoto Stadium.
The home team replace Kazuya Konno with Yojiro Takahagi.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tokyo drive upfield and Keigo Higashi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kobe defender.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Adailton's header is off-target for Tokyo.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
In the minute 50, Tokyo takes a corner from the right.
Tsuyoshi Watanabe (Tokyo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in Tokyo.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kobe's Junya Tanaka is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Kobe at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Yutaro Oda (Kobe) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Yusuke Araki awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Kyogo Furuhashi is replacing Keijiro Ogawa for the away team.
In the minute 61, Atsuhiro Miura is making the team's second substitution at Ajinomoto Stadium with Daiju Sasaki replacing Yutaro Oda.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Yusuke Araki signals a Kobe throw-in in Tokyo's half.
At Ajinomoto Stadium, Gotoku Sakai has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Kensuke Nagai of Tokyo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 64, Yusuke Araki awards Kobe a goal kick.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Important block from the Kobe defence as Joan Oumari fires in a strike for Tokyo.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Tokyo attack but Adailton's header doesn't find the target.
Kobe have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Noriaki Fujimoto is on a sub for Junya Tanaka for Kobe.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Kyogo Furuhashi hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Kobe.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
Tokyo make their second substitution with Hirotaka Mita replacing Keigo Higashi.
The home team have replaced Adailton with Taichi Hara. This is the third substitution made today by Kenta Hasegawa.
In the minute 70, Kenta Hasegawa (Tokyo) is making a fourth substitution, with Hotaka Nakamura replacing Takumi Nakamura.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In the minute 72, Hirotaka Mita of Tokyo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Tokyo drive upfield and Kensuke Nagai gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kobe defender.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Kobe.
Takuya Yasui gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kobe.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 75, Kobe make their fourth substitution with Yuya Nakasaka replacing Takuya Yasui.
Yusuke Araki signals a throw-in for Tokyo, close to Kobe's area.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Kobe at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Kobe's Ryuho Kikuchi has been booked in Tokyo.
Free kick Kobe.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 84, Throw-in high up the field for Tokyo in Tokyo.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Kobe.
Tokyo's Joan Oumari scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 85, That's a fine assist from Kensuke Nagai.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Kobe at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Kobe are coming forward and Noriaki Fujimoto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
At Ajinomoto Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Kobe.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Yusuke Araki signals a Kobe throw-in in Tokyo's half.
In Tokyo Kobe drive forward through Kyogo Furuhashi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
The match has come to a close in Tokyo. The final score is 1-0.
Takuya Uchida is replacing Kensuke Nagai for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
